mapper.update: UPDATE RunningAccount SET costAttribute = #{costAttribute}, costAttributeType = #{costAttributeType}, companyName = #{companyName}, projectName = #{projectName}, abstractContent = #{abstractContent}, entrys = #{entrys}, outs = #{outs}, payment = #{payment}, payee = #{payee}, remark = #{remark}, row_modifier = #{row_modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, row_modify_time = str_to_date(#{row_modify_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE RunningAccount SET row_state = 0, row_modifier = #{row_modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, row_modify_time = str_to_date(#{row_modify_time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') WHERE id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select ra.id, ra.costAttribute, ra.costAttributeType, ra.companyName, ra.projectName, ra.abstractContent, ra.entrys, ra.outs, ra.payment,ra.payee,ra.remark, date_format(ra.row_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime from RunningAccount ra where ra.row_state = 1
and ra.companyName like concat('%', #{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and ra.row_create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTimeStart},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and ra.row_create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by ra.row_create_time desc
